short_summary: Software as a Service (SaaS) Online Survey application to collect, track and report on data for Survey activities across the organization.
description: Deliver an online SaaS (software as a service) Survey platform that can be accessed by all CR personnel. To collect, track, and report on all types of data elements for the Government of Canada. The SaaS Survey platform should provide detailed information on all data elements, trends. and all types of summaries. An auto field analysis shall also be made to help understand and determine various non-relevant and invalid data points and provide entity matching. An audit process is required to track all changes made over time, Once implemented, the SaaS Survey platform shall allow organizations to retain existing data and return it in the source data format, And data shall be accessible from allenses or devices for vibrtation improvements
duration_in_months: That this service project will be estimated for 3 months

**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

# Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-8764-74923329
* **Solicitation Number:** 1000401904
* **Publication Date:** 2023-09-05
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-10-30T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

# Procurement Description

The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) invites bids for the procurement of annual concurrent user licenses for access to an externally hosted, web-based, Software as a Service (SaaS) Online Survey solution for CRA users to manage, conduct, and generate analytics for public opinion research activities. The successful contractor will also provide training services to train CRA users on the full capabilities of the Online Survey solution.

This requirement includes options to purchase additional quantities of annual concurrent user licenses for the SaaS Online Survey solution (including maintenance and support), and professional services and training requirements.

# Contract Period

The period of any resulting contract will be for three (3) years, with the option to extend for up to seven (7) additional one (1)-year periods.

# Evaluation Criteria

A bid must comply with the requirements of the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria to be declared responsive. The responsive bid with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be recommended for award of a contract.

# Language of Submission

Proposal documents and supporting information must be submitted in either English or French.

# Conditional Set-Aside

This procurement may be conditionally set aside under the federal government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. Bidders must certify that they qualify as Indigenous businesses and comply with all requirements to be considered for the set-aside.

# Contact Information

* **Name:** Shawn Woods
* **Email:** Shawn.Woods@cra-arc.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (613) 291-9615

# Bid Submission

Bids must be submitted using the Connect service provided by the Canada Post Corporation. For instructions, please refer to the Standard Instructions 2003.

# Attachments

The following documents are attached to this tender notice:

* rfp_-saas-online-survey-solution.pdf (English)
* ddp_solution-de-sondage-en-ligne-sur-les-logiciels-en-tant-que-service.pdf (French)
